_version.description: Represents SAPUI5 attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

resources.description: Represents paths to JavaScript/CSS resources that your app needs (app internal), formerly called '.includes'

componentUsages.description: Represents the explicit usage declaration for UI5 reuse components

dependencies.description: Represents external dependences such as libraries or components, that will be loaded by UI5 Core in the initialization phase of your Component and can be used after it

minUI5Version.description: Represents the minimum version of SAP UI5 that your component requires

libs.description: Represents the id (namespace) of the libraries that should be loaded by UI5 Core to be used in your component

components.description: Represents the id (namespace) of the components that should be loaded by UI5 Core to be used in your component

models.description: Represents models which should be created/destroyed with the life-cycle of the component

resourceRoots.description: Represents relative path to the resource. Only relative path allowed, no '../'

rootView.description: Represents the name of the root view

handleValidation.description: Represents the usage of validation handling by MessageManager for this component (enable/disable)

config.description: Represents the static configuration for components
Represents the default properties defined for route and target

async.description: Indicates whether the Views in routing are loaded asyncly

bypassed.description: Represents information about targets to display when no route is matched

target.description: Represents one or multiple names of targets that are displayed when no route is matched

oneOf.description: Represents the definition of routes by providing an array with elements which contain the configuration for each route
Represents the definition of routes by providing an object with the route's name as the key and other route options in an object as the value

viewName.description: Represents the name of a view that will be created

viewID.description: Represents the id of the created view

extends.description: Represents the extension of an additional component

minVersion.description: Represents minimal version of the component

contentDensities.description: Represents object with content density modes the app is supporting. Supported density modes are 'cozy' and 'compact'

compact.description: Represents indicator whether compact mode is supported

cozy.description: Represents indicator whether cozy mode is supported

componentName.description: Represents a name of the UI5 component

autoPrefixId.description: Enables the auto prefixing of IDs of ManagedObjects (e.g. Controls) which are created in context of the Component (e.g. createContent invocation)

appVariantId.description: Represents the identifier of an application variant. The value will be calculated and should not be set manually

appVariantIdHierarchy.description: Represents array of appVariantId hierarchy with origin layer and version, calculated attribute and filled automatically during variant merge

layer.description: Represents origin layer of the app variant id

version.description: Represents version of the app variant id

services.description: Represents a list of the services

i18n.description: Flag whether the library contains a i18n resource or not. If using a string instead of a boolean value an alternative name for the i18n resource could be defined.

css.description: Flag whether the library contains a CSS file or not.

content.description: Represents the content of a library. Content are controls, elements, types and interfaces.

deviceType.description: Represents device types on which the app is running

desktop.description: Represents indicator whether desktop device is supported, default true

tablet.description: Represents indicator whether tablet device is supported, default true

phone.description: Represents indicator whether phone device is supported, default true

minVersion.description: Represents minimal version of ui5 library
Represents minimal version of ui5 component

componentData.description: Represents component data for the Component

dataSource.description: Represents string of key/alias from sap.app dataSources to reference an existing data source

preload.description: Indicates that the model will be immediately created after the manifest is loaded by Component Factory and before the Component instance is created

defaultBindingMode.description: Represents default binding mode and must be a string value from sap.ui.model.BindingMode. Possible values: Default, OneTime, OneWay, TwoWay

viewName.description: Represents the name of the view

type.description: Represents the type of the view. Possible Values: XML, JSON, JS, HTML, Template

route.description: Represents the definition of each route

name.description: Represents the name of the route

routeWithoutName.description: Represents the definition of route without the option 'name'. This is used when routes are defined in an object.

pattern.description: Represents the url pattern that the route is matched against

greedy.description: Whether the route should be matched when another route is already matched

target.description: Represents one or multiple names of targets which are displayed when the route is matched

titleTarget.description: Represents the name of the target where the 'title' information should be taken

target.description: Represents the definition of each target

title.description: Represents the information which is included as a parameter of the 'titleChanged' event fired on Router when this target is displayed. The title can be set with static text and can also be set with a valid property binding syntax which will be resolved under the scope of the view in the target where the title property is defined.

viewType.description: Represents the type of view that is going to be created

viewPath.description: Represents a prefix that is prepended in front of the viewName

targetParent.description: Represents the id of the view that contains the control specified by the 'controlId'

controlId.description: Represents the id of the control where you want to place the view created by the target

controlAggregation.description: Represents the name of an aggregation of the controlId that contains the views

clearControlAggregation.description: Whether the aggregation of the control should be cleared before adding the view

parent.description: Represents the name of another target which will also be displayed once this target is displayed

viewLevel.description: Represents the level of the current view which is used to define the transition direction when navigate to this view

transition.description: Represents the type of transition when navigating from previous view to this view

transitionParameters.description: Represents the transition parameters that are passed to the event handlers

service.description: Represents the definition of each service

factoryName.description: Represents the name of the service factory

optional.description: Indicates whether the service optional or not
